entries.name: development
entries.desc: Allows enabling/disabling use of development dependencies

entries.name: from_specs()
entries.desc: Creates a DependencyList from the current specs.

entries.name: new(development = false)
entries.desc: Creates a new DependencyList.  If development is true, development dependencies will be included.

entries.name: add(*gemspecs)
entries.desc: Adds gemspecs to the dependency list.

entries.name: dependency_order()
entries.desc: Return a list of the gem specifications in the dependency list, sorted in order so that no gemspec in the list depends on a gemspec earlier in the list.

entries.name: ok?()
entries.desc: Are all the dependencies in the list satisfied?

entries.name: ok_to_remove?(full_name, check_dev=true)
entries.desc: It is ok to remove a gemspec from the dependency list?

entries.name: remove_by_name(full_name)
entries.desc: Removes the gemspec matching full_name from the dependency list

entries.name: remove_specs_unsatisfied_by(dependencies)
entries.desc: Remove everything in the DependencyList that matches but doesn't satisfy items in dependencies (a hash of gem names to arrays of dependencies).

entries.name: spec_predecessors()
entries.desc: Return a hash of predecessors.  result[spec] is an Array of gemspecs that have a dependency satisfied by the named gemspec.
